snippet: Small-business owners are receiving millions of dollars in rebates thanks to the health care overhaul. What these owners can do with the money is not entirely clear.
abstract: Small-business owners are receiving millions of dollars in rebates thanks to the health care overhaul. What these owners can do with the money is not entirely clear.

headline.main: The Affordable Care Act Rebate Checks Are in the Mail: Now What?

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
